variable_item_list.c

1#include "variable_item_list.h"
2#include <gui/elements.h>

9struct VariableItem {
10 FuriString* label;
11 uint8_t current_value_index;
12 FuriString* current_value_text;
13 uint8_t values_count;
14 VariableItemChangeCallback change_callback;
15 void* context;
16
17 bool locked;
18 FuriString* locked_message;
19};
20
21ARRAY_DEF(VariableItemArray, VariableItem, M_POD_OPLIST);
22
23struct VariableItemList {
24 View* view;
25 VariableItemListEnterCallback callback;
26 void* context;
27
28 FuriTimer* scroll_timer;
29 FuriTimer* locked_timer;
30};
31
32typedef struct {
33 VariableItemArray_t items;
34 uint8_t position;
35 uint8_t window_position;
36
37 FuriString* header;
38 size_t scroll_counter;
39 bool locked_message_visible;
40} VariableItemListModel;
41
42static void variable_item_list_process_up(VariableItemList* variable_item_list);
43static void variable_item_list_process_down(VariableItemList* variable_item_list);
44static void variable_item_list_process_left(VariableItemList* variable_item_list);
45static void variable_item_list_process_right(VariableItemList* variable_item_list);
46static void variable_item_list_process_ok(VariableItemList* variable_item_list);
47
48static size_t variable_item_list_items_on_screen(bool header) {
49 size_t res = 4;
50 return (header) ? res - 1 : res;
51}
52
53static void variable_item_list_draw_callback(Canvas* canvas, void* _model) {
54 VariableItemListModel* model = _model;
55
56 const uint8_t item_height = 16;
57 uint8_t item_width = canvas_width(canvas) - 5;
58
59 canvas_clear(canvas);
60
61 if(!furi_string_empty(model->header)) {
62 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontPrimary);
63 canvas_draw_str(canvas, 4, 11, furi_string_get_cstr(model->header));
64 }
65
66 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
67
68 uint8_t position = 0;
69 VariableItemArray_it_t it;
70 for(VariableItemArray_it(it, model->items); !VariableItemArray_end_p(it);
71 VariableItemArray_next(it)) {
72 uint8_t item_position = position - model->window_position;
73 uint8_t items_on_screen =
74 variable_item_list_items_on_screen(!furi_string_empty(model->header));
75 uint8_t y_offset = furi_string_empty(model->header) ? 0 : item_height;
76
77 if(item_position < items_on_screen) {
78 const VariableItem* item = VariableItemArray_cref(it);
79 uint8_t item_y = y_offset + (item_position * item_height);
80 uint8_t item_text_y = item_y + item_height - 4;
81 size_t scroll_counter = 0;
82
83 if(position == model->position) {
84 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
85 elements_slightly_rounded_box(canvas, 0, item_y + 1, item_width, item_height - 2);
86 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
87 scroll_counter = model->scroll_counter;
88 if(scroll_counter < 1) {
89 scroll_counter = 0;
90 } else {
91 scroll_counter -= 1;
92 }
93 } else {
94 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
95 }
96
97 uint8_t temp_x_default = 73;
98 uint8_t temp_w_default = 66;
99 if(item->current_value_index == 0 && furi_string_empty(item->current_value_text)) {
100 // Only left text, no right text
101 canvas_draw_str(canvas, 6, item_text_y, furi_string_get_cstr(item->label));
102 } else {
103 if(furi_string_size(item->current_value_text) < (size_t)4) {
104 temp_x_default = 80;
105 temp_w_default = 71;
106 }
107 elements_scrollable_text_line_centered(
108 canvas,
109 6,
110 item_text_y,
111 temp_w_default,
112 item->label,
113 scroll_counter,
114 false,
115 false);
116 }
117
118 if(item->locked) {
119 canvas_draw_icon(canvas, 110, item_text_y - 8, &I_Lock_7x8);
120 } else {
121 if(item->current_value_index > 0) {
122 canvas_draw_str(canvas, temp_x_default, item_text_y, "<");
123 }
124
125 elements_scrollable_text_line_centered(
126 canvas,
127 (115 + temp_x_default) / 2 + 1,
128 item_text_y,
129 37,
130 item->current_value_text,
131 scroll_counter,
132 false,
133 true);
134
135 if(item->current_value_index < (item->values_count - 1)) {
136 canvas_draw_str(canvas, 115, item_text_y, ">");
137 }
138 }
139 }
140
141 position++;
142 }
143
144 elements_scrollbar(canvas, model->position, VariableItemArray_size(model->items));
145
146 if(model->locked_message_visible) {
147 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
148 canvas_draw_box(canvas, 8, 10, 110, 48);
149 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
150 canvas_draw_icon(canvas, 10, 14, &I_WarningDolphin_45x42);
151 canvas_draw_rframe(canvas, 8, 8, 112, 50, 3);
152 canvas_draw_rframe(canvas, 9, 9, 110, 48, 2);
153 elements_multiline_text_aligned(
154 canvas,
155 84,
156 32,
157 AlignCenter,
158 AlignCenter,
159 furi_string_get_cstr(
160 VariableItemArray_get(model->items, model->position)->locked_message));
161 }
162}
163
164void variable_item_list_set_selected_item(VariableItemList* variable_item_list, uint8_t index) {
165 with_view_model(
166 variable_item_list->view,
167 VariableItemListModel * model,
168 {
169 uint8_t position = index;
170 const size_t items_size = VariableItemArray_size(model->items);
171
172 if(position >= items_size) {
173 position = 0;
174 }
175
176 model->position = position;
177 model->window_position = position;
178
179 if(model->window_position > 0) {
180 model->window_position -= 1;
181 }
182
183 uint8_t items_on_screen =
184 variable_item_list_items_on_screen(!furi_string_empty(model->header));
185
186 if(items_size <= items_on_screen) {
187 model->window_position = 0;
188 } else {
189 const size_t pos = items_size - items_on_screen;
190 if(model->window_position > pos) {
191 model->window_position = pos;
192 }
193 }
194 },
195 true);
196}
197
198uint8_t variable_item_list_get_selected_item_index(VariableItemList* variable_item_list) {
199 VariableItemListModel* model = view_get_model(variable_item_list->view);
200 uint8_t idx = model->position;
201 view_commit_model(variable_item_list->view, false);
202 return idx;
203}
204
205void variable_item_list_set_header(VariableItemList* variable_item_list, const char* header) {
206 furi_assert(variable_item_list);
207
208 with_view_model(
209 variable_item_list->view,
210 VariableItemListModel * model,
211 {
212 if(header == NULL) {
213 furi_string_reset(model->header);
214 } else {
215 furi_string_set_str(model->header, header);
216 }
217 },
218 true);
219}
220
221static bool variable_item_list_input_callback(InputEvent* event, void* context) {
222 VariableItemList* variable_item_list = context;
223 furi_assert(variable_item_list);
224 bool consumed = false;
225
226 bool locked_message_visible = false;
227 with_view_model(
228 variable_item_list->view,
229 VariableItemListModel * model,
230 { locked_message_visible = model->locked_message_visible; },
231 false);
232
233 if((!(event->type == InputTypePress) && !(event->type == InputTypeRelease)) &&
234 locked_message_visible) {
235 with_view_model(
236 variable_item_list->view,
237 VariableItemListModel * model,
238 { model->locked_message_visible = false; },
239 true);
240 consumed = true;
241 } else if(event->type == InputTypeShort) {
242 switch(event->key) {
243 case InputKeyUp:
244 consumed = true;
245 variable_item_list_process_up(variable_item_list);
246 break;
247 case InputKeyDown:
248 consumed = true;
249 variable_item_list_process_down(variable_item_list);
250 break;
251 case InputKeyLeft:
252 consumed = true;
253 variable_item_list_process_left(variable_item_list);
254 break;
255 case InputKeyRight:
256 consumed = true;
257 variable_item_list_process_right(variable_item_list);
258 break;
259 case InputKeyOk:
260 variable_item_list_process_ok(variable_item_list);
261 break;
262 default:
263 break;
264 }
265 } else if(event->type == InputTypeRepeat) {
266 switch(event->key) {
267 case InputKeyUp:
268 consumed = true;
269 variable_item_list_process_up(variable_item_list);
270 break;
271 case InputKeyDown:
272 consumed = true;
273 variable_item_list_process_down(variable_item_list);
274 break;
275 case InputKeyLeft:
276 consumed = true;
277 variable_item_list_process_left(variable_item_list);
278 break;
279 case InputKeyRight:
280 consumed = true;
281 variable_item_list_process_right(variable_item_list);
282 break;
283 default:
284 break;
285 }
286 }
287
288 return consumed;
289}
290
291void variable_item_list_process_up(VariableItemList* variable_item_list) {
292 with_view_model(
293 variable_item_list->view,
294 VariableItemListModel * model,
295 {
296 uint8_t items_on_screen =
297 variable_item_list_items_on_screen(!furi_string_empty(model->header));
298 if(model->position > 0) {
299 model->position--;
300
301 if((model->position == model->window_position) && (model->window_position > 0)) {
302 model->window_position--;
303 }
304 } else {
305 model->position = VariableItemArray_size(model->items) - 1;
306 if(model->position > (items_on_screen - 1)) {
307 model->window_position = model->position - (items_on_screen - 1);
308 }
309 }
310 model->scroll_counter = 0;
311 },
312 true);
313}
314
315void variable_item_list_process_down(VariableItemList* variable_item_list) {
316 with_view_model(
317 variable_item_list->view,
318 VariableItemListModel * model,
319 {
320 uint8_t items_on_screen =
321 variable_item_list_items_on_screen(!furi_string_empty(model->header));
322 if(model->position < (VariableItemArray_size(model->items) - 1)) {
323 model->position++;
324 if((model->position - model->window_position) > (items_on_screen - 2) &&
325 model->window_position <
326 (VariableItemArray_size(model->items) - items_on_screen)) {
327 model->window_position++;
328 }
329 } else {
330 model->position = 0;
331 model->window_position = 0;
332 }
333 model->scroll_counter = 0;
334 },
335 true);
336}
337
338VariableItem* variable_item_list_get_selected_item(VariableItemListModel* model) {
339 VariableItem* item = NULL;
340
341 VariableItemArray_it_t it;
342 uint8_t position = 0;
343 for(VariableItemArray_it(it, model->items); !VariableItemArray_end_p(it);
344 VariableItemArray_next(it)) {
345 if(position == model->position) {
346 break;
347 }
348 position++;
349 }
350
351 item = VariableItemArray_ref(it);
352
353 furi_assert(item);
354 return item;
355}
356
357void variable_item_list_process_left(VariableItemList* variable_item_list) {
358 with_view_model(
359 variable_item_list->view,
360 VariableItemListModel * model,
361 {
362 VariableItem* item = variable_item_list_get_selected_item(model);
363 if(item->locked) {
364 model->locked_message_visible = true;
365 furi_timer_start(
366 variable_item_list->locked_timer, furi_kernel_get_tick_frequency() * 3);
367 } else if(item->current_value_index > 0) {
368 item->current_value_index--;
369 model->scroll_counter = 0;
370 if(item->change_callback) {
371 item->change_callback(item);
372 }
373 }
374 },
375 true);
376}
377
378void variable_item_list_process_right(VariableItemList* variable_item_list) {
379 with_view_model(
380 variable_item_list->view,
381 VariableItemListModel * model,
382 {
383 VariableItem* item = variable_item_list_get_selected_item(model);
384 if(item->locked) {
385 model->locked_message_visible = true;
386 furi_timer_start(
387 variable_item_list->locked_timer, furi_kernel_get_tick_frequency() * 3);
388 } else if(item->current_value_index < (item->values_count - 1)) {
389 item->current_value_index++;
390 model->scroll_counter = 0;
391 if(item->change_callback) {
392 item->change_callback(item);
393 }
394 }
395 },
396 true);
397}
398
399void variable_item_list_process_ok(VariableItemList* variable_item_list) {
400 with_view_model(
401 variable_item_list->view,
402 VariableItemListModel * model,
403 {
404 VariableItem* item = variable_item_list_get_selected_item(model);
405 if(item->locked) {
406 model->locked_message_visible = true;
407 furi_timer_start(
408 variable_item_list->locked_timer, furi_kernel_get_tick_frequency() * 3);
409 } else if(variable_item_list->callback) {
410 variable_item_list->callback(variable_item_list->context, model->position);
411 }
412 },
413 true);
414}
415
416static void variable_item_list_scroll_timer_callback(void* context) {
417 VariableItemList* variable_item_list = context;
418 with_view_model(
419 variable_item_list->view,
420 VariableItemListModel * model,
421 { model->scroll_counter++; },
422 true);
423}
424
425void variable_item_list_locked_timer_callback(void* context) {
426 furi_assert(context);
427 VariableItemList* variable_item_list = context;
428
429 with_view_model(
430 variable_item_list->view,
431 VariableItemListModel * model,
432 { model->locked_message_visible = false; },
433 true);
434}
435
436VariableItemList* variable_item_list_alloc() {
437 VariableItemList* variable_item_list = malloc(sizeof(VariableItemList));
438 variable_item_list->view = view_alloc();
439 view_set_context(variable_item_list->view, variable_item_list);
440 view_allocate_model(
441 variable_item_list->view, ViewModelTypeLocking, sizeof(VariableItemListModel));
442 view_set_draw_callback(variable_item_list->view, variable_item_list_draw_callback);
443 view_set_input_callback(variable_item_list->view, variable_item_list_input_callback);
444
445 variable_item_list->locked_timer = furi_timer_alloc(
446 variable_item_list_locked_timer_callback, FuriTimerTypeOnce, variable_item_list);
447
448 with_view_model(
449 variable_item_list->view,
450 VariableItemListModel * model,
451 {
452 VariableItemArray_init(model->items);
453 model->position = 0;
454 model->window_position = 0;
455 model->header = furi_string_alloc();
456 model->scroll_counter = 0;
457 },
458 true);
459 variable_item_list->scroll_timer = furi_timer_alloc(
460 variable_item_list_scroll_timer_callback, FuriTimerTypePeriodic, variable_item_list);
461 furi_timer_start(variable_item_list->scroll_timer, 333);
462
463 return variable_item_list;
464}
465
466void variable_item_list_free(VariableItemList* variable_item_list) {
467 furi_assert(variable_item_list);
468
469 with_view_model(
470 variable_item_list->view,
471 VariableItemListModel * model,
472 {
473 furi_string_free(model->header);
474 VariableItemArray_it_t it;
475 for(VariableItemArray_it(it, model->items); !VariableItemArray_end_p(it);
476 VariableItemArray_next(it)) {
477 furi_string_free(VariableItemArray_ref(it)->label);
478 furi_string_free(VariableItemArray_ref(it)->current_value_text);
479 furi_string_free(VariableItemArray_ref(it)->locked_message);
480 }
481 VariableItemArray_clear(model->items);
482 },
483 false);
484 furi_timer_stop(variable_item_list->scroll_timer);
485 furi_timer_free(variable_item_list->scroll_timer);
486 furi_timer_stop(variable_item_list->locked_timer);
487 furi_timer_free(variable_item_list->locked_timer);
488 view_free(variable_item_list->view);
489 free(variable_item_list);
490}
491
492void variable_item_list_reset(VariableItemList* variable_item_list) {
493 furi_assert(variable_item_list);
494
495 with_view_model(
496 variable_item_list->view,
497 VariableItemListModel * model,
498 {
499 VariableItemArray_it_t it;
500 for(VariableItemArray_it(it, model->items); !VariableItemArray_end_p(it);
501 VariableItemArray_next(it)) {
502 furi_string_free(VariableItemArray_ref(it)->label);
503 furi_string_free(VariableItemArray_ref(it)->current_value_text);
504 furi_string_free(VariableItemArray_ref(it)->locked_message);
505 }
506 VariableItemArray_reset(model->items);
507 furi_string_reset(model->header);
508 },
509 false);
510}
511
512View* variable_item_list_get_view(VariableItemList* variable_item_list) {
513 furi_assert(variable_item_list);
514 return variable_item_list->view;
515}
516
517VariableItem* variable_item_list_add(
518 VariableItemList* variable_item_list,
519 const char* label,
520 uint8_t values_count,
521 VariableItemChangeCallback change_callback,
522 void* context) {
523 VariableItem* item = NULL;
524 furi_assert(label);
525 furi_assert(variable_item_list);
526
527 with_view_model(
528 variable_item_list->view,
529 VariableItemListModel * model,
530 {
531 item = VariableItemArray_push_new(model->items);
532 item->label = furi_string_alloc_set(label);
533 item->values_count = values_count;
534 item->change_callback = change_callback;
535 item->context = context;
536 item->current_value_index = 0;
537 item->current_value_text = furi_string_alloc();
538 item->locked = false;
539 item->locked_message = furi_string_alloc();
540 },
541 true);
542
543 return item;
544}
545
546VariableItem* variable_item_list_get(VariableItemList* variable_item_list, uint8_t position) {
547 VariableItem* item = NULL;
548 furi_assert(variable_item_list);
549
550 with_view_model(
551 variable_item_list->view,
552 VariableItemListModel * model,
553 {
554 if(position < VariableItemArray_size(model->items)) {
555 item = VariableItemArray_get(model->items, position);
556 }
557 },
558 true);
559
560 return item;
561}
562
563void variable_item_list_set_enter_callback(
564 VariableItemList* variable_item_list,
565 VariableItemListEnterCallback callback,
566 void* context) {
567 furi_assert(callback);
568 with_view_model(
569 variable_item_list->view,
570 VariableItemListModel * model,
571 {
572 UNUSED(model);
573 variable_item_list->callback = callback;
574 variable_item_list->context = context;
575 },
576 false);
577}

594
595void variable_item_set_locked(VariableItem* item, bool locked, const char* locked_message) {
596 item->locked = locked;
597 if(locked) {
598 furi_assert(locked_message);
599 furi_string_set(item->locked_message, locked_message);
600 }
601}
